meanings.definition: Evolvers: Those who evolve or develop over time.
meanings.sent1: The evolvers in the forest adapted to their changing environment.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study evolvers to understand how species change over generations.
meanings.sent3: The evolvers at the zoo were always curious about new things.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were evolvers, constantly transforming and growing.
meanings.sent5: The evolvers in the story were like characters in a book, each chapter revealing something new.

meanings.definition: Evolvers: Devices or mechanisms that bring about change or development.
meanings.sent1: The evolvers in the machine helped improve its efficiency.
meanings.sent2: Engineers use evolvers to create innovative technologies.
meanings.sent3: The evolvers in the clock made time fly by faster.
meanings.sent4: Her words were evolvers, sparking a revolution in their community.
meanings.sent5: The evolvers in the experiment were like magic, transforming ordinary objects into extraordinary ones.

meanings.definition: Evolvers: The act of evolving or developing.
meanings.sent1: The evolvers of the caterpillar into a butterfly amazed the children.
meanings.sent2: The evolvers of technology have changed the way we live.
meanings.sent3: The evolvers of the plant reaching for the sunlight were quite determined.
meanings.sent4: Her dance was an evolver, gracefully transitioning from one move to the next.
meanings.sent5: The evolvers of the city skyline over the years were a testament to progress and growth.
